System.Object.MemberwiseClone() System.Object.ReferenceEquals(System.Object, System.Object) System.Object.ToString() Namespace : CG.Sequences.CosmoDb Assembly : CG.Sequences.CosmoDb.dll Syntax public class SequenceCosmosClient : CosmosClient, IDisposable Remarks The idea, with this class, is to create a concrete client type that is distinctly registered for use with Sequence CosmoDb repository types. That way, we (hopefully) prevent type clashes, in the DI container, that might otherwise force us to resort to using factory classes in order to isolate our CosmoDb client from anything else that might also be using CosmoDb clients types. Ahh, the joys of DI ... Constructors SequenceCosmosClient(String, CosmosClientOptions) This constructor creates a new instance of the SequenceCosmosClient class. Declaration public SequenceCosmosClient(string connectionString, CosmosClientOptions clientOptions = null) Parameters Type Name Description System.String connectionString The connection string to use with the client. Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.CosmosClientOptions clientOptions The options to use with the client. SequenceCosmosClient(String, String, CosmosClientOptions) This constructor creates a new instance of the SequenceCosmosClient class. Declaration public SequenceCosmosClient(string accountEndpoint, string authKeyOrResourceToken, CosmosClientOptions clientOptions = null) Parameters Type Name Description System.String accountEndpoint The endpoint to use with the client. System.String authKeyOrResourceToken The auth key to use with the client. Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.CosmosClientOptions clientOptions The options to use with the client. Implements System.IDisposable
